Class PlaylistTrackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.controllers.PlaylistTrackController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources/playlisttracks")
public class PlaylistTrackController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for the resource pointed by the url: /resources/playlisttracks*
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
